title: Rina-chan’s Board “Beep Beep Beep”
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Hey hey, Rina-chan. Rin has a favor to ask you<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>What is it? Is it something…. that I can do?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Yeah, it’s something that only Rina-chan can do. Umm…. Well~, Rin wants to try making a Rina-chan’s board….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Rina-chan’s Board “Beep Beep Beep”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Hmm? Beep Beep Beep?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>It’s a sound that means “Rin-chan would make a great Rina-chan’s board for sure”. I’m…. happy<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Eh-! Can Rin really make a good one?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Yes…. Should we…. make it together?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Yaay Yaay! Can Rin invite Kayochin and Maki-chan too?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>The four of us…. will make it together? I’m so happy…. Rina-chan’s board “Mesmerized”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
